Maria Lopez.description: conversing about Maria Lopez and Klaus Mueller conversing about making plans for a romantic rendezvous and dinner later that night @ <persona> Klaus Mueller
chat: Hey Klaus! All ready for another crazy day in this love villa? Well, I'm certainly not, but seeing you all dolled up makes me want to hurry! By any chance, are you free for a little rendezvous later tonight?
I was hoping you'd say something like that! I'm all dressed up with nowhere to go yet. How about we make a plan for later tonight? Just you and me. Intrigued?

You're surely the most exciting option I have tonight, Klaus! I'd love to keep you company. Let's make it happen later tonight, and we can continue this fascinating conversation over a romantic meal ;)
